lines.gurmukhi: nYhr kuAwir kMinAw lwiflI kY mwnIAiq; ibAwhy ssurwr jwie gunnu kY mwnIAY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: An unmarried daughter is loved by everyone in parental house and enjoys respect in the in-laws house because of her virtues.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: nYhr ipauky Gr kuAwir kMinAw kuAwrI bytI nUM lwiflI lwf dI ipAwrI kr ky mMinAwˆ jwˆdw hY[ AQvw lwflI hox kr ky Es dw Awdr krdy hn, pr ibAwhy ivAwihAwˆ jwx qy ssurwr sOhry Gr igAwˆ gunn kY gxwˆ nwl Awdr mwixAw krdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: bnj ibauhwr lig jwq hY ibdyis pRwnI; khIey spUq lwB lBq kY AwnIAY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: As one goes to other cities to trade and earn living, but one is known as an obedient son only when one makes profit;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: bnj ibauhwr lig vxj vpwr qQw kwrobwr sOdwgrI Kwqr pRwnI vwˆFy prdys jwˆdw hY jykr qwˆ auh lwB lBq kY AwnIAY lwB dI lBq kr ky AQvw K`tI K`t ky ilAwvy qwˆ spUq khIey spuqr spuqr kr ky sB AwKdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau sMgRwm smY pr dl mY Akylo jwie; jIiq AwvY soeI sUro suBtu bKwnIAY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: As a warrior ingresses into enemy ranks and comes out victorious is known as a brave man.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: jYsy qau ijs qrHwˆ Pyr koeI sUrmw khwxhwrw sMgRwm smyˆ rx m`icAwˆ jMg juitAwˆ pr dl mY Akylo jwie jIq AwvY prweI sYnw ivKy Ak`lw hI vYrIAwˆ nUM ij`q ky Aw jwvy qwˆ soeI sUro suBt bKwnIAY Esy nUM hI sUrmw bhwdr khIdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: mwns jnmu pwie crin srin gur; swDsMgiq imlY gurduAwir pihcwnIAY [118[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Similarly he who enjoins the holy gatherings, acquire the refuge of the True Guru is accepted in the court of the Lord. (118)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iesy pRkwr jykr mnu`Kw jnm pw ky siqgurwˆ dI crx srx siqsMg ivc Awx imly, qwˆ Esy nUM hI gurdÍwry gurU duAwry gurwˆ dy quPYl mnu`K pxy nUM sPl krx hwrw Asl mrd pihcwnIAY pCwxIdw hY ]118]
